alert.note: Alert for Sandusky; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 3:44AM EST until February 23 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Cleveland OH has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Ohio... Portage River At Woodville affecting Wood and Sandusky Counties. For the Portage River...including Woodville...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Portage River At Woodville. * WHEN...From this morning to late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, The river inundates lower portions of Trail Marker Park and is out of banks in Pemberville. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 AM EST Thursday the stage was 8.2 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage this morning to 9.3 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon to 7.7 feet this evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.3 feet on 06/15/2004. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 145 PM EST.
